verbs.description: [ARG0: President Barack Obama] [V: took] [ARG1: some time] [ARG2: out of a speech] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [ARGM-PRP: to rake members of the media over the coals for coverage of Donald Trump] .
[ARG0: President Barack Obama] took some time out of a speech on Tuesday to [V: rake] [ARG1: members of the media] [ARG2: over the coals] [ARGM-PNC: for coverage of Donald Trump] .
